hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #an Ice Cavern Compass# and #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #the Boomerang# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Front Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #flames in the royal tomb# reveal #the Megaton Hammer#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Hidden Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Heart Container#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Game Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hidden Ceiling Chest

LH (Lab).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #11# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: While you're wasting time reading this hint, the others are playing the seed.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path of time.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial First Left Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #0# major items.
